title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using Build 20011106 and having a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button does not populate the 'Enclosing Type' field. The field remains blank.
EB: When using Build 20011106 and having a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button should automatically populate the 'Enclosing Type' field with the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor. 
2. Click the new class button. 
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field. 

Expected result: The 'Enclosing Type' field should be populated with the current type in the editor.
